Seed surface ribbed: the seed surface is nearly smooth
Roots: there are no roots on the plant
Thallus edge: the edge of the thallus is smooth (without teeth) near the tip
Thallus shape: the thallus is elliptic (widest near the middle and tapering at both ends)
the thallus is oblong (rectangular but with rounded ends)
Thallus shape in cross-section: the thallus is somewhat flattened on at least one side in cross-section
Thallus stalks: the thallus does not have a stalk
